//Derangements
#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long long int t,n,i;
	long long int arr[21];
	arr[1] = 0;
	arr[2] = 1;
	arr[3] = 2;
	for(i = 4;i<21;i++)
		arr[i] = (i-1) * (arr[i-1] + arr[i-2]);
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		printf("%lld\n",arr[n]);
	}
	return 0;
}
